quote: Method is more important than strength, when you wish to control your enemies. By dropping golden beads near a snake, a crow once managed To have a passer-by kill the snake for the beads.
quote_letters: METHOD IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN STRENGTH WHEN YOU WISH TO CONTROL YOUR ENEMIES BY DROPPING GOLDEN BEADS NEAR A SNAKE A CROW ONCE MANAGED TO HAVE A PASSER-BY KILL THE SNAKE FOR THE BEADS
